statements: DELETE FROM security_personnel_locations WHERE personnel_id = 123 AND recorded_at < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM security_personnel WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND location_point = POINT(1, 1) AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM patrol_routes WHERE route_name='Main Entrance';
DELETE FROM check_ins WHERE personnel_id = 2 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, check_in_time, NOW()) > 30;
DELETE FROM PatrolActivity WHERE personnel_id = 100 AND activity_date = '2022-01-15';
